abstract: Cloud computing company TriPlay acquires digital music store EMusic for undisclosed sum.
lead_paragraph: TriPlay plans to integrate eMusic into MyMusicCloud, a service that lets people link their music collections to a range of devices.

headline.main: TriPlay to Acquire eMusic, a Pioneering Digital Music Service
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; TriPlay Buys EMusic, the Digital Music Store

snippet: TriPlay plans to integrate eMusic into MyMusicCloud, a service that lets people link their music collections to a range of devices.
